about_the_game:
What does the future hold? The reign of cruel King Illeon has come to an end. Love triumphed over evil, and peaceful times have returned to the land. But there are new adventures ahead for our heroes. In the depths of the Enchanted Forest, you encounter a dragon. Fear not, it's only a hatchling! What do you do with it? Of course, you cannot tell a single living soul about your lucky find. Especially when a traveling circus has stopped on its way to a performance at the royal palace, attracting the attention of a thousand eyes. Or maybe just enjoy the show!

This Collector's Edition includes:

💋 Shape the Fate of Kingdoms!

Every decision you make will impact the story and alter the course of entire kingdoms. Will you guide the hunter, the fortune teller, and the exiled prince to safety, or lead them down a path of peril? Your choices will shape alliances and determine the future of the magical world!

💋 Solve Intricate Puzzles!

Engage in a variety of challenging puzzles that test your logic and creativity. From complex riddles to clever mini-games, each puzzle is designed to be both rewarding and relaxing. Unlock special achievements as you progress and dive deeper into the storyline!

💋 Collect & Explore!

Explore stunning environments filled with hidden objects and collectibles. From the mystical Enchanted Forest to the vibrant circus, each location is rich with detail. Find unique treasures, lore items, and hidden secrets that enhance the immersive experience while expanding the game’s world!

💋 Stunning Fantasy World!

Journey through beautifully crafted locations teeming with magical creatures, breathtaking scenery, and intricate world-building. From enchanted forests to lively circus tents, the world of Royal Romances will captivate your imagination and immerse you in its rich atmosphere!
